landing_html.mission: " Our mission is to remove all the barriers between countries and unite the world by providing the ultimate traveling experience. Regardless a program or a transportation chosen we guarantee a premium satisfaction "
landing_html.about_us_description:
Manar Travelwas founded in 1990, we are a company of experience, trust and passion that have been in the traveling field for more than 60 years .
Our trips are customized based on your schedule and budget, whether you have a plan to your next destination or haven't decided yet Manar Travel is here to guide you.
Manar Travel is not only committed to providing you with an unforgettable and inspiring trip,weâ€™re also committed to ensuring your happiness and comfort throughout.When you travel with us, you can feel confident knowing we have staff in every country who are available to accommodate your wishes and needs
